H0.text: A summary paragraph is the best way to present the daily temperature data that a student records in the schoolyard over a month, allowing each day's temperature to be compared.

H1.text: A labeled diagram is the best way to present the temperature data recorded by a student every day for a month so that each day can be compared.

H2.text: Pie chart is the best way to present the temperature data so each day can be compared for a student who records the temperature in the schoolyard every day for a month.

H3.text: Bar graph is the best way to present the temperature data recorded by a student in the schoolyard every day for a month so that each day can be compared.

A4.text: A bar graph shows comparisons among discrete categories.
